query:
SELECT 
  i.id,
  pu.postUrl,
  i.interactionType,
  i.status,
  i.errorMessage,
  i.executedAt,
  i.createdAt
FROM interactions i
JOIN post_urls pu ON i.postUrlId = pu.id
WHERE pu.projectId = 90001
  AND i.status = 'failed'
ORDER BY i.createdAt DESC
LIMIT 1;
